snippet: The schedule is increasingly crowded for a simple reason: The more matches countries play, the more they stand to earn from television rights....
abstract: Cricket is disadvantaged compared to other global sports by crowded schedule and mix of formats that often force top players to miss major games; International Cricket Council hopes to overhaul system so that star athletes can represent their countries in international matches while maintaining lucrative career in domestic leagues.
lead_paragraph: The schedule is increasingly crowded for a simple reason: The more matches countries play, the more they stand to earn from television rights.

headline.main: International Test Cricket Is Facing a Threat: Too Many Matches
headline.print_headline: International Game Threatened by an Abundance of Matches
